title: Paying the Rent
description: Kristine, Wendy and Stacy have a landlord who keeps raising the rent till it's impossible for them to pay. With money, anyway...Mr. Johnson has made it known that he might be open to "alternative arrangements"... but it just might be more than these young women can bear!This is a very short story with hardcore themes including humiliation, pain, reluctant/coerced sex. Read with caution!
author: Dylan Cross
